ing: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TELÂ®)
1 teaspoon olive oil, or to taste
des: "One of my favorites. Great for parties."
ins: Stir black beans, corn, tomatoes with green chile peppers, diced green chiles, cilantro, lemon-pepper seasoning, cumin, and olive oil together in a large bowl. Refrigerate until cold, about 30 minutes.
